text: aur jo log apane paravaradigaar se darate the vah girdo girda (giroh giroh) behisht kee taraf (ejaaz va ikaraam se) bulae jaegen yahaan tak ki jab usake paas pahunchegen aur behisht ke daravaaze khol diye jaengen aur usake nigehabaan un se kahengen salaam alaikum tum achchhe rahe, tum behisht mein hamesha ke lie daakhil ho jao
